name: VNP Group
description:
VNP Group is the leading company in e-commerce and internet communications in Vietnam. Our strategic partners are IDG Ventures Vietnam, Cyber Agent Venture, Mitsui & Co., and Recruit JV.
In the spirit of sustainable and professional development, VNP focuses on developing three strategic groups of projects:
? E-commerce: Vatgia.com, iki.vn, cucre.vn, nhanh.vn, baokim.vn, mytour.vn and webbnc.vn
? Digital content: 123doc.vn, Appstore.vn
? Other projects: The Kafe and One Office
VNP Group is constantly looking for true talents to lead our 1000+ staff organization that is hungry and ready to conquer even more. In return, we share business opportunities and offer intensive leadership development and coaching programs, fast track career roadmaps and very competitive performance-based packages
